repository.corpname: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation & Archives

did.abstract: Transcript of interview with Mary Donlon, conducted by Alex Hawryluk.

defitem.label: Contact Information:
defitem.item: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives Martin P. Catherwood Library 227 Ives Hall Cornell University Ithaca, NY 14853 (607) 255-3183 kheel_center@cornell.edu http://www.ilr.cornell.edu/library/kheel-center

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a transcript of an interview with Judge Mary Donlon on March 10, 1966. The interview was conducted by Alex Hawryluk in Ives Hall at Cornell University.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Mary Donlon Interview #/3090. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Materials
relatedmaterial.p: Related Collections: /3065: ILR School Extension Division Records /4028: ILR School Dean's Office Additional Records 5221: Max Meyer Papers 5307: Consumers' League of New York City Records 6046: Archives Union File (AUF) 6047: Archives Information File

did.unittitle: Transcript of interview with Mary Donlon

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Interview conducted by Alex Hawryluk on March 10, 1966; 55 pages.
